articles.title: A company hacked into a Tesla Model S Plaid to hit a record 216 miles per hour
articles.description: The nearly $130,000 Tesla model has not previously been reported to have run faster than 200 miles per hour.
articles.content:
A Tesla Model S Plaid hit its fastest speed on record Thursday after a software company hacked into the vehicle's software restrictions.
